posts.post_content:
The really cool thing about this card, though, is that its like a [forcefield](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=forcefield) at uncommon.  
Also, story circle won't save you from [Darksteel Colossus](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Darksteel Colossus) or his new brother [Blightsteel](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Blightsteel)

posts.post_content:
Incredibly powerful card in EDH.
  
   
It stops General damage outright, it stops lifelink (since the damage is never dealt), it stops "damage everyone" effects like Earthquake, Inferno, etc.
  
   
This card is close to a Forcefield in power, and yet is generally considered a forgotten common.
posts.html:

posts.post_content:
I remember getting a bunch of these out of Visions boosters, looking at them and going "why wouldn't I just use a [Circle of Protection](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Circle of Protection)? Who wants to pay 2 life to prevent damage when I could just prevent it all?"  
  
Yeah, I was pretty dumb back then. This card has saved me so many times I've lost count. Prevent all damage from ANY source, not just of a specific color/etc. like [Story Circle](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Story Circle). The uses are innumerable.  
  
Good to use alongside Story Circle, I suppose. Between the two you should have all your bases covered.
posts.html:

Yeah, I was pretty dumb back then. This card has saved me so many times I've lost count. Prevent all damage from ANY source, not just of a specific color/etc. like Story Circle. The uses are innumerable.

Good to use alongside Story Circle, I suppose. Between the two you should have all your bases covered.
